free_text.Learning outcomes: This course first presents the underlying optical principles for conceiving and building complex optical systems. During the lecturing period the underlying optical principles will be presented in an unified picture in order to conceive optical system with the help of advanced optical design tools. The second part of this course is hands-on training in optical system design based on selected problems and examples.
